title: TORCHSTAR 0-10V LED Dimmer Switch, Single-Pole or 3-Way Light Switch, 120-277V for Dimmable LED Panel Light Linear Light, ETL Listed, Pack of 2

product_information.Best Sellers Rank: Best Sellers Rank:  #69,340 in Tools & Home Improvement (See Top 100 in Tools & Home Improvement)    #138 in Dimmer Switches       #138 in Dimmer Switches

product_category: Tools & Home Improvement›Electrical›Switches & Dimmers›Wall Switches›Dimmer Switches
feature_bullets: Wide Compatibility: This dimmer light switch is suitable for maximum 600W incandescent lamps and 200W LED or fluorescent lamps, while completely eliminating flicker and noise, giving you a harmonious living environment

Smooth Dimming: This Low Voltage Dimmer switch can achieve 100%-10% full range smooth dimming, 10/0V is the darkest, but will not turn off the light, 100/10V is the brightest. You can choose your own brightness as you wish
Adjustable Wheel: This 0-10V Dimmer Switch for LED Lights has an adjustable wheel on the left side for maximum dimming range for a wide variety of conditions
3-Way Dimming: Supports 3-way dimming for multiple controls. In this way, you can connect one 3-way dimmer switch, and the common 3-way switch can be used at the same time to achieve dimming effect
ETL Listed & 2-year warranty：This dimmer switch comes with a 2-year warranty and you can feel assured using it.If any questions,you can feel free to reach out to us
NOTE: 0-10V Dimmer Switch works with 0-10V dimmable lights and requires correct wiring

customers_say: Customers give positive feedback about the dimmer switch's functionality, with one mentioning it works well with LED ceiling lights. However, the dimming range receives mixed reviews, with several customers reporting poor performance. Additionally, the quality receives negative feedback, with one customer noting a 50% failure rate.AI Generated from the text of customer reviews

customer_reviews.review_title: 5.0 out of 5 starsAll around good 0-10v dimmer
customer_reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2022
customer_reviews.review_snippet: I don't write a lot of reviews, but I feel these dimmers have earned it.  I don't know why so many 0-10v dimmers are so expensive, there's not that much going on inside them.  These work well and are priced where I would expect them to be.  I had the other less expensive ones you see more often, and these are way better for the look, feel and function.  These have only one adjustment for minimum brightness, the other brands had adjustments for both min and max.

customer_reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on April 24, 2025
customer_reviews.review_snippet: Worked for our new led ceiling lights.

customer_reviews.review_title: 2.0 out of 5 starsYou get what you pay for
customer_reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on February 16, 2025
customer_reviews.review_snippet: I, like many others bought this because of the price.  I am sure you found this switch because of how much cheaper it is compared to other switches that do the same thing.  I will be returning this item because it just worries me too much, and that is something I never had to do before.  As an electrician I just do not feel comfortable using this product.1. You can just feel the difference in quality between this switch and any other rocker switch.  It weighs close to nothing and feels cheap2. The rocker switch has no resistance when you push it and feels mushy3. It doesn’t snap like a normal switch to on/off.  You can actually very easily put it in between on/off and that really worries me4. The switch is only rated to 6amps.  I need it to control LED lights and even with LEDs it doesn’t take much to overload that5. It isn’t UL listed, it is ETL listed but any quality products are almost always UL listed in the US

customer_reviews.rating: 5.0 out of 5 stars5.0 out of 5 stars
customer_reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on February 14, 2024
customer_reviews.review_snippet: I used this switch to create a light wall for my wife. The 0-10 dimmer worked as it should. Easy install and easy to read instructions.

customer_reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on February 17, 2024
customer_reviews.review_snippet: I purchase these switches for use on LED panels and strip lighting for client projects. They are easy to install and the slide function is very smooth. The paddle switch has a good positive feel when switching on and off.

customer_reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on March 15, 2023

customer_reviews.review_title: 2.0 out of 5 starsDimming Range is Very Poor
customer_reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on November 17, 2024
customer_reviews.review_snippet: This switch only dims to about 40- 50%.  Much less low end than the cheap switch I was using previously.  I am also getting lots of fluctuation in the dimming, which I can't be positive is coming from the switch but wasn't happening with the previous switch so it appears to be.

customer_reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on November 11, 2024
customer_reviews.review_snippet: Had to return. They dimmed the lights, but only barely, maybe from 100% to 75%. Not really dim, just a little less than full brightness.
